LocationPopup.Title: Dock
LocationPopup.Description: Vessels of every shape crowd the docks as sailors haul exotic cargo. The air hangs thick with sweat and salt. A fine spot for sea views on a rest day—but you've arrived at a bustling hour.

LocationPopup.Title: Tavern
LocationPopup.Description: This is the only taven in town, anyone can find comfort here. Sleep, drink, food, or...something else?
